casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Abraham HARRISON. No. 228A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 27, 2005. M. Lynne Weaver, Assistant Attorney, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of October 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Abraham Harrison) shall have up to and including the 7th day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of October 2005."
